title: Who is Nate in Emmerdale and why does he hate Cain?
text:
Could things turn lethal for Nate, Cain and Moira tonight? (Picture: ITV)

Nate Robinson (Jurell Carter) has been meddling in Cain Dingle’s (Jeff Hordley) life ever since his character joined Emmerdale earlier this year.

From his affair with Moira (Natalie J Robb) and subsequent threats to reveal their secret, to his relationship with Amy Wyatt (Natalie Ann Jamieson) and help to get full custody of her son back from Cain – not to mention the fact he tipped police off to Cain being in possession of stolen car parts – Nate has made no secret of his vendetta again Cain.

So who is Nate really in Emmerdale and what are his reasons for hating Cain?

Who is Nate and why does he hate Cain?

Nate first entered the soap back in April this year, as the toy-boy who had kissed Rhona (Zoe Henry) on a night out in Hotten.

Since then, Nate has been linked to Moira and Amy too, as well as Tracy Metcalfe (Amy Walsh).

Advertisement

Advertisement

Actor Jurell Carter spoke of his character before he entered the soap, saying: ‘For me, he likes the older ladies but he likes the ones around his age as well, so I don’t think he’s just for older women. He’s for everyone.’

The character has had a clear vendetta against Cain for some time and now both actors Jurell Carter and actress Sally Dexter (who plays Faith Dingle) have confirmed that Nate is indeed hiding something and fans will be shocked to learn the truth behind his secret identity.

While we don’t know exactly why Nate hates Cain so much, the reasoning seems to be rooted in the secret that will be exposed tonight, which will give viewers some context to Nate’s ongoing vendetta.

Speaking to the Daily Star, Jurell teased: ‘There are so many theories out there but when the audience see it they will be shocked. I found out about it when I was first cast and I was like: “Wow.” I don’t want to spoil it but it’s a massive reveal.’

Emmerdale airs tonight on ITV at 7pm.

description: Nate Robinson (Jurell Carter) has been meddling in Cain Dingle's (Jeff Hordley) life ever since he was introduced to Emmerdale back in April.
